source.16f52bfb:
def battle_of_two(x,y,title,plot='scatter'):
    plt.figure(figsize=(7,7))
    subset = df[[x, y]]
    plt.figure(figsize=(7,7))
    if plot=='scatter':
        scatterplot(data=subset,x=x,y=y)
        plt.title(title)
        plt.show()
    else:
        lineplot(data=subset,x=x,y=y)
        plt.title(title)
        plt.show()
    
    #Correlation Plot
    plt.figure(figsize=(7,7))
    heatmap(subset.corr(),fmt='g',annot=True)
    plt.title('Correlation HeatMap')
    plt.show()

plt.figure(figsize=(15,10))
for col in df.columns[2:]:
    plt.plot(list(df[col])[::-1],label=col)

plt.xlabel('Country Rank')
plt.ylabel('Value')
plt.title('Comparing all features')
plt.legend()
plt.show()
